name: Wap's hellpit
description:
I make games, or so I made games. These are fossils even to me, like an ancient discovery. Here you can play some well unfinished shit I slapped up a couple years back, how cool.
Some builds are up too if you want to look at death defying code.

Good: The Game (05/08/2019)
Imagine one of those funny and bonkers games that are supposed to be terrible except it actually is terrible and was made 2 years ago.

HotCross (01/05/2019)
A first person shooter with a twist, well it would if I made it. I believe this is the most up to date version, I had this stored on my google drive for the longest time and if it's not then oh well ahah (it is the build with hats).
Remember to press E Q R Ctrl Shift and stuff, they're useful. I'm not explaining anything else.
It was supposed to be released in easter, hence HotCross.

Bean 5.6 (2018??)
I had to rebuild it with a new version I hope it works. Would probably make more sense to just give the builds for these, huh.

--tell me to add these

PeeKey
RPG, never really started, you can view a devlog on my channel its unlisted

Jeg's Game
A game doubley unfinished <- delete the errors by downloading the .rblx file if you want to play that
I might make this prim and proper once I have the time, you can see the devlog aswell.
